sentences.english: Mountain half marathon in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Canada.

sentences.english: Kidnapping is the main worry in Colombia.

sentences.english: Colombian officials were arrested quickly. Then Amador made a speech.

sentences.english: Laura Zúñiga said they were “going shopping” in Bolivia and Colombia.

sentences.english: He's also famous for once having hit the celebrated Colombian writer Gabriel Garcia Marquez.
sentences.chinese: 他也曾经讽刺著名哥伦比亚作家马奎斯而名震一时。

sentences.english: She's also an associate professor at Columbia journalism school.

sentences.english: Forty-one states plus the District of Columbia have lotteries.

sentences.english: Miguel is a young Colombian politician blinded by his own privilege.
sentences.chinese: 米格尔是个被特权冲昏头脑的哥伦比亚政治家。

sentences.english: Martha studies genetic engineering at Columbia.

sentences.english: It could be Berkeley or Columbia or maybe Berlin.

sentences.english: Colombia-sourced raw materials would make the return journey to China.

sentences.english: No local financing for abortion services in the District of Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府也不应该为哥伦比亚区的坠胎服务买单。
